text:
When using "include ..../mod_jk.conf-auto" from within a <VirtualHost>
mod_jk core dumps....

I am using apache1.3.14 + mod_ssl 2.7.1 + tomcat 3.2.1 (src) + mod_jk (from 
tc321 src) 

Moving the "include .../mod_jk.conf-auto" to outside a <VirtualHost> works just 
fine.

Here is the a gdb trace of the bug:

[root@sc-dhcp121 bin]# gdb httpd 
[... snip ...]
(gdb) set args -DSSL -t
(gdb) run
Starting program: /usr/local2/apache_1.3.14/bin/httpd -DSSL -t

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x4037ac1a in merge_jk_config (p=0x80b121c, basev=0x0, overridesv=0x80eb7cc)
    at mod_jk.c:773
773         if(base->ssl_enable) {
creator: jean-paul_abgrall@phoenix.com
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: Won't make into 3.2.2.  Hopefully this can be addressed in a later release.
